port.title: Port
port.description: Port for USB stick (example: /dev/tty.usbmodem144). If not set, it tries to find port automatically.

panId.title: PanId
panId.description: Identify the ZigBee PAN-ID. This id should be a value between 1 and 65534 (0xFFFE). You can also set it to 65534 (0xFFFE) to let ZigBee choose a random PAN-ID on its own.

secondaryChannel.title: Secondary Channel
secondaryChannel.description: Secondary (backup) Channel for your ZigBee dongle (11-25).

adapter.title: Adapter
adapter.description: Type of adapter to use. Default to zstack

database.title: Database
database.description: Path to zigbee database. If not set, it uses 'homebridge_storage_path/zigbee.db' path.

routerPollingInterval.title: Ping Interval
routerPollingInterval.description: Ping interval for routers to prevent them from sleeping (in seconds).

disableRouterPolling.title: Disable Router Polling
disableRouterPolling.description: Turn off the polling for router devices

disableHttpServer.title: Disable HTTP Server (UI)
disableHttpServer.description: Turn off the HTTP server and the internal UI used for managing devices

httpPort.title: HTTP Server Port
httpPort.description: Port for HTTP server. Default to 9000

disableLed.title: Disable Led
disableLed.description: Turn off the stick led indicator.
